Sequence Information.Peptide Name: BIN1b (Sperm-associated antigen 11; Antimicrobial-like protein Bin-1b; Rodents, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antimicrobial peptide against E.coli. Is also responsible for sperm maturation, storage, and protection.
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Only expressed in epididymis (middle part of the caput).
Sequence Information.Developmental stage: Its expression starts at 30 days of age, reaches a maximum during the sexually mature period, and then decreased in old rats.

Literature.Title: Recombinant expression and characterization of an epididymis-specific antimicrobial peptide BIN1b/SPAG11E.
Literature.Author: Guo C, Diao H, Lian Y, Yu H, Gao H, Zhang Y, Lin D.

Literature.Title: An antimicrobial peptide gene found in the male reproductive system of rats.
Literature.Author: Chung Y.W.,So S.C.,He B.,Chan H.C.,Li P.
